requests.description: Here you will find jobs in which a customer has expressed direct interest in you. The chances of getting one of these jobs are very high if you like one of them.

applicationOfferForm.visibleCaregiverSalaryTooltip: The caregiver only sees this price for a job. All other prices are not visible. If you send the job to a caregiver, she will see this price as her salary.

applyForJobModal.applicationSentDescription: Your application has been sent successfully. You will find all the details of your application in the profile of the nurse, which was created automatically. Take a look at it here.

applyForJobModalNoResults.description: You have to create caregivers to be able to apply for a job. Either via API/import or manually via the next step. In manual mode you can also use our PDF profile reader.

caregiverBooking.confirm: I confirm that my confirmation of the application is binding. The agency will draw up a contract and inform the caregiver for the journey.

caregiverDetailsSidebar.requestForJobDescription: Your request is not yet binding. The agency can send you an application in response to your request, only then is the acceptance binding.

caregiversAll.description: For a better understanding, we have created an example of a caregiver. Take a look at the profile to understand what a full-time caregiver looks like. When you are ready, create your first caregiver yourself. All information about mass import and the API can be found here.

caregiversNoActivity.description: No activity means for this caregivers, you have not received any requests, no applications are in progress, and the caregiver has not liked any jobs.

jobDetailsList.historyEmptyAlert: You don't have any activities yet.

jobFullyOccupied.contentLineOne: The job is full with {count} applications. You can apply again from {date} or as soon as an application is rejected.
jobFullyOccupied.contentLineTwo: If you want, create a reminder and we will send you an email as soon as the job is open.

jobDetailsListApplications.tipDescription: Everyone can see your job and apply for it. To initiate things, it is advisable to request for matching caregivers from your point of view. Just take a look at the list below to see which one matches your job.
jobDetailsListApplications.youDontHaveAnyActivitiesYet: You don't have any activities yet. Here you will see the applications you have received for the job.
jobDetailsListApplications.youDontHaveAnyActivitiesYetCg: You don't have any activities on the job yet. Here you will see the applications you have made and requests you have received for a caregiver.

jobDetailsPriceCalculationModal.visibleSalary: Visible salary price for your app caregivers

alertJobFilled.description: On this page you will find all the necessary information about your job. You will be notified immediately by email when there is something new. If you have any questions, please contact the agency via chat.

alerts.confirmationWithdrawn: Attention. Your confirmation has been withdrawn. Your job has been automatically reopened and released for the search. You currently have no applications.
alerts.endsTomorrow: Your job ends tomorrow! Please select an option on how to proceed.

jobDetailsWelcome.description: At the top right you can apply for a job with a suitable caregiver. As soon as you have applied, you will see them listed here. If you have a request for a caregiver, it will also appear here.

jobMarketWelcome.description: On this page you can see all advertised jobs. You can filter and display jobs according to your wishes and view all the details of the job by clicking on it. To apply for a job, you need to import your caregivers, connect them via API or create them manually.

info.description: If you adjust these matching search parameters, it will affect all available caregivers. Already requested and applied caregivers will be notified with the change in the chat.

priceAndContractSettingsVisibilityForCar.theMamamiaFeeIs: The mamamia fee is 5 euros per day of use.
priceAndContractSettingsVisibilityForCar.whenMakingCalculation: When making your calculation, take into account the possible costs of VAT on the agent's invoice and the mamamia fee of €5/day.
priceAndContractSettingsVisibilityForCar.youCanGrant: You can grant your supervisors access to the system and thus optimize         communication. The CG can then see and like the jobs and also retrieve         information such as contracts, address, arrival data, etc. directly.
priceAndContractSettingsVisibilityForCar.yourAndAffiliated: Your and affiliated caregivers can apply for jobs and select you as thesender. This is only possible if prices can be displayed to them. You can define your deductions here. Below you can see a sample calculation.
